hibernate-mapping.query: select new org.mifos.application.productdefinition.util.valueobjects.MasterObject(ynm.yesNoMasterID,lookupvalue.lookUpValue) from org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.YesNoMaster ynm,org.mifos.application.master.util.valueobjects.LookUpValueLocale lookupvalue where ynm.lookUpId=lookupvalue.lookUpId and lookupvalue.localeId=:localeId
